ValidationRule.description: an incident or injury checkbox must be selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Validation_Rule__c && OR( RecordType.Name = 'Incident / Injury / Illness', RecordType.Name = 'Incident Injury Submitted') && (AND(!CLQ_Allergic_Reaction_Asthma_Attack__c, !CLQ_Broken_Disclosed_Bone__c, !CLQ_Collapse_Faint__c, !CLQ_No_Pulse_Not_Breathing__c, !CLQ_Poisoning__c, !CLQ_Sprain_Strain__c, !CLQ_Tooth_injury__c, !CLQ_Blow_or_Bump_to_the_Head__c, !CLQ_Outbreak_of_illness__c, !CLQ_Deep_Cut_Laceration__c, !CLQ_Object_inserted_into_body_part__c, !CLQ_Seizure__c, !CLQ_Suspected_broken_bone_dislocation__c, !CLQ_Other_injury_requiring_medical_trmt__c, !CLQ_Abuse_of_child_by_any_adult__c, !CLQ_Child_Unattended_On_site_Outside_Pgm__c, !CLQ_Death_of_a_Child__c, !CLQ_Intruder_Enters_the_Program__c, !CLQ_Natural_Man_made_Disaster__c, !CLQ_Threat_of_violence__c, !CLQ_Weapon_found__c, !CLQ_Child_unattended_on_site_inside_pgm__c, !CLQ_Child_unattended_off_site_program__c, !CLQ_Inappropriate_touching_sexual_play__c, !CLQ_Medication_error__c, !CLQ_Prohibitive_discipline_techniques__c, !CLQ_Vehicle_accident__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must check something from the 'Type of Child Injury or Illness' or the 'Type of Child Incident' section.
